law.history: Repealed 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 502, sec. 10, effective April 11, 1990. -- Created 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 138, sec. 4, effective July 15, 1982.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Secretary's emergency fund -- No project to be undertaken if not included in program -- Exceptions -- Additional projects to be submitted to interim joint committee on transportation -- Cost limit for preliminary analysis of prospective projects.
